parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: From husteros; to be later, i.e. to be inferior; generally, to fall short.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.
A mother. Apparently a primary word; a 'mother'.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
